LanguageData.VFES_Turret_MilitaryTurret.label: military turret
LanguageData.VFES_Turret_MilitaryTurret.description: A military-grade double barreled automatic turret. Requires steel to refurbish its barrels after heavy use. May explode when damaged. Its dumb AI brain can't be directly controlled, so beware of friendly fire.
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_MilitaryTurret.label: military turret doublegun
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_MilitaryTurret.description: Two simple automatic guns made to be mounted on a turret.
LanguageData.VFES_Turret_Searchlight.label: searchlight
LanguageData.VFES_Turret_Searchlight.description: An apparatus combining an extremely luminous lamp and a mirrored parabolic reflector, useful for lighting up and dazzling targets.
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_Searchlight.label: searchlight
LanguageData.VFES_Turret_Flame.label: flame turret
LanguageData.VFES_Turret_Flame.description: A portable flamethrower turret. May explode when damaged. Its dumb AI brain can't be directly controlled, so beware of friendly fire.
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_FlameTurret.label: flame turret gun
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_FlameTurret.description: A flamethrower made to be mounted on a turret.
LanguageData.VFES_Turret_SentryGun.label: sentry gun
LanguageData.VFES_Turret_SentryGun.description: A self-powered turret with a small gatling gun mounted on top. Light enough to be carried and deployed wherever. May explode when damaged. Its dumb AI brain can't be directly controlled, so beware of friendly fire.
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_SentryTurret.label: sentry turret gun
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_SentryTurret.description: A fully automatic gatling gun made to be mounted on a turret.
